website_summaries.verdict: Excellent price point per ounce versus other pet ear cleaners. Offers a slight scent of Apple Kiwi to deodorize too. Helps with itching and smells from your pet's ears, as well as preventing problems like fungus and bacteria growth.
pros: Works equally well for dogs and cats
Doesn't contain harsh chemicals, so you can use it with the pet every day if required
Large bottle of cleaner, so it's a good value for multi-pet homes
Alcohol free so low chance of irritating pets, and made in the USA
cons: Some pets may not tolerate this cleaning solution well, leading to irritated skin
Other owners occasionally report their pets are still scratching their ears

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my dog was always scratching her ears and rubbing her head on the floor, grass.... just to try out and see if it helps. The first application I can see my doggie looks so relieved and I did not see her trying to scratch her ear at all. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: veena singh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed when discovered blue coloring solution - did not use
customer_reviews.text: Did not use on my dog's ears once I saw the liquid was blue colored. Like why did manufacturer think it was necessary to add blue dye to an ear solution? I am very disappointed this wasn't mentioned in the listing and didn't come across in any reviews - had I been aware of that I would not have ordered. Instead, tried a diluted solution of white vinegar to clean then applied a product called Emuaid. That quickly eradicated my pup's yeast / bacterial ear infection in just a few days.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Eat cleaner works!
customer_reviews.text: This product came promptly and is reasonably priced. Used on my dog’s ears as directly and by next day she no longer scratched at her ears or shook her head. I will definitely buy this again when this bottle is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Tokarz

customer_reviews.title: Gave our Dog Chemical Burns
customer_reviews.text: Followed all instructions, 1 year old dog is healthy and happy, two applications in and he had major chemical-like burns inside his ear. Poor thing whined all night till we could call the vet. DO NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works!! Period.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was highly skeptical about this product working on ear mites/ear infection but I am so happy to say I have become a believer! This product helped my dogs with ear mites and an ear infection. We now use it as a routine care and no more ear problems since. Definitely worth a try for any ear problems
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous332Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use on my dog. Like that it is alcohol-free and aloe vera infused. Overall a great product and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: So, I brought this product after reading the reviews. This is the first day, but she seems to be a peace. For days, she been scratching and whining. I put the product in her ear and so much gunk flew out. It was actually disgusting, but she looked so relieved.
customer_reviews.author: Andrie White

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner worked great , it detroyed the ear mite infection in a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Harris

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to help cleaning my dogs ears he had mites, the only negative was that it dried his ear out.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for our big dogs ears....smells wonderful and helping keep away the infections.
customer_reviews.author: Deb T

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps soothe itchy ears.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few days so far, but it definitely looks promising. Luna hasn't scratched her ears at all since I've started using it. The kiwi apple scent is an interesting choice, but it keeps the cats from licking it.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Still hoping it will work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 bottles and tried it for my dog who keeps scratching her ears. Used 3 or 4 times and followed directions from the bottle, but my dog is still scratching her ears. Still hoping it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty's Pretty

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, does the job
customer_reviews.text: My guy was constantly scratching his ear. 3 treatments, no more scratching. recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Huff

customer_reviews.title: This did nothing for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: My dog had mites that he got from another dog. I tried this stuff for 10 days and my dog still had them. I followed instructions and still did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Pattyconklin

customer_reviews.title: Scratch Ears No More
customer_reviews.text: My dog quit scratching his ears after one application. I will use this weekly. I think this product will work to keep his ears clean and free of yeast and bacteria. Yea!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my groomer
customer_reviews.text: Use it once a week on my dog with ear problems and no more infections
customer_reviews.author: Anne the brave

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ear cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I like that this cleaner does such a great job of cleaning. It does as stated and the green apple scent is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Benyshek

customer_reviews.title: Boris
customer_reviews.text: It's early to tell, but after two days he is no longer shaking his head. As far as sturdy goes, it is early.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs get ear infections often. This product helped reduce ear infections by almost 100%. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Renner

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and Smells Good
customer_reviews.text: Used with cotton ball, cleaned ears very well also has good scent compared to other product I used.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH DESTEFANO

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product helped us get rid of ear mites. Adding this to my subscriptions. If you do not want to medicate your fur baby this takes time but does heal ear mites. It took a month but did the trick
customer_reviews.author: Cinderella

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and effective
customer_reviews.text: The formulation cleaned well without irritation. After several applications, the irritation caused by prior cleaners incl vet prescription cleared and healthy tissue was restored. All signs of prior yeast and bacterial growth have abated. I will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good ear cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: My lab struggles with ear issues. We have found this cleaner to be really helpful. It has a clean scent & works well.
customer_reviews.author: Coronado7

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE, FOR THE MONEY...
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used, as of yet; so, I CANNOT REALLY FORM AN OPINION, YET...
customer_reviews.author: William D. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Super effective treatment for ear mites in my kitties ears!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by how quickly this product solves my kitty's ear mite problem! It also quickly healed her sore which had developed behind her ear from the telltale scratching! Very impressed and pleased! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tammara L. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work pretty quickly in cleaning and relieving the itch.
customer_reviews.author: Marine Momma

customer_reviews.title: This medicine does not irritate my dog's ears at all.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't burn or aggravate my dog's ears and it's the first time my dog just relaxed and allowed me to doctor her ears. This stuff is great. I have tried at least four types and so far this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Hatten Rushing

customer_reviews.title: Do not use
customer_reviews.text: This product gave both my cat and dog horrible ear infections. I had to switch to a home remedy. Will NEVER buy agin and advise to find a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Dunleavy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well in my German Shepherd’s ears. The smell is quite pleasant also.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cocker Spaniel ears!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! Very effective. My dog loves it and it smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Marie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best ear cleaner ever. Bought it and use it on my dogs and now amazon sells it. Can’t go wrong! Dogs don’t fight me it doesn’t sting them or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Budge-Heaslet

product_meta.title: Dog Ear Cleaner, 8oz | Made in USA, Best Ear Mite & Infection Treatment | Alcohol-Free, Aloe Vera Infused, Non-Irritating Ear Wash Drops Solution Formula | Eliminates Itching & Odors for Cats & Pets
feature_bullets: SAFE & EFFECTIVE: Pawstruck's 8 oz. VETERINARY recommended formula safely and effectively removes and kills pathogens in the ear canal. Our formula is infused with Aloe Vera and (2%) Salicylic Acid. This solution harmlessly removes Itching, Fungus, Microbes, Bacteria, Itchy Ear, Yeast Infection Treatment, and Antimicrobial, Antifungal, and Antibacterial. Our Apple Kiwi Scent eliminates EAR ODOR and kills bacteria. Suitable for daily use and even perfect after baths or swimming.

ALCOHOL-FREE, NON-IRRITATING EAR WASH: Pawstruck ear cleanser is an alcohol-free formula for a no-sting, non-irritating experience. Our solution is for sensitive ears! Infused with Aloe Vera, to soothe the ear canal and break-up wax gently. It provides a deeper clean than ear wipes, drops, and other ear cleaners out there. Our formula can be used 1 to 2 times a week to prevent future infections caused by bacteria--such as yeast infections and yeast bacterial infections.

CAT & DOG EAR WAX REMOVER: Pawstruck Advanced Ear Cleaner is a professional grade ear wash that removes reddish brown wax, dirt or any other types of wax build-up. Our solution is safe to use multiple times a week. It will heal scaling, redness, inflammation, and itchy ears caused by dog allergies. Long floppy ears, tend to hold in moisture and are prone to ear infections and wax build-up. Our otic ear wash will suck moisture out and balance the pH level of the ear.

EAR MITE TREATMENT: Pawstruck Otic Cat and Dog Ear Cleaning wash will remove debris caused by mites living in your pet's ears. This powerful ear cleaning formula will kill mite eggs hiding in ear canals. Our ear flush will not only help heal internal ear mite infections but will also help soothe and deodorize external ear infections caused by parasites. Pawstruck ear cleaning solution is infused with Aloe Vera to relieve inflammation, redness, and irritation caused by mites.

MADE IN USA: At Pawstruck, we consider our earwash the best and proudly make it for canines and felines in a federally regulated facility in the United States of America. This product is NASC certified, which means we are committed to the quality of our products. At Pawstruck, we want you to be 100% satisfied with your purchase. We stand behind our 30-day SATISFACTION GUARANTEE. If this isn’t the best ear cleaner for dogs you’ve ever purchased, our customer care team is ready to help.
